original_text: This is a short essay with exactly ten words for testing purposes.

Thesis & Topic Understanding.feedback: No discernible thesis or topic.  The submission is far too short to establish either.

Structure & Coherence.feedback: No discernible structure or coherence; the submission is a single, extremely short phrase.

Content Depth, Balance & Relevance.feedback: No content to evaluate; the submission lacks depth, balance, and relevance.

Language Proficiency & Expression.feedback: Insufficient language to evaluate proficiency or expression.

Critical Thinking & Analytical Reasoning.feedback: No critical thinking or analytical reasoning demonstrated.

Word Count & Length Control.feedback: Extremely short; far below the minimum word count requirement.

grading_result.summary_feedback: This submission is far too short to be considered an essay. It fails to meet the minimum requirements for length and content.  The lack of a thesis statement, developed arguments, and a conclusion renders the submission incomplete and unassessable.

suggestions: Expand on your ideas with detailed arguments and supporting evidence.
Write a substantial conclusion to summarize your points.
Consider using an outline to structure your essay.
